title: Safety & Risk Mitigation
subtitle: Safety and risk mitigation are critical in any industry. Our sensors help you monitor environmental conditions to prevent accidents and ensure compliance with safety regulations. We offer a range of sensors to monitor temperature, humidity, CO2 levels, and other important parameters.

products.name: [CROPWATCH] LoRaWATCH
products.description: The LoRaWATCH is a smartwatch that monitors personal data. It can detect temperature, heart-rate, and blood oxigen levels. It is designed to help you stay safe and healthy in hot, working environments.

products.name: [TEKTELIC] Personal Badge Tracker
products.description: Wearable Badge Style Device for Indoor & Outdoor Personnel and Asset Tracking and Monitoring

products.name: [TEKTELIC] Breeze-v
products.description: This intelligent sensor actively monitors and manages crucial factors, including CO2 levels, temperature, humidity, and occupancy. By promoting superior air quality, BREEZE-V creates a comfortable and productive atmosphere,

products.name: [NETVOX] Smoke Detector
products.description: The Netvox RA02A is a smoke detection alarm. The RA02A has a built-in photoelectric smoke detector and buzzer. It can detect the smoke density in the environment and sound an alarm when the smoke density exceeds the safe/default value.
